item.para: In copy-in mode, if directory attributes do not permit writing to it, setting them is delayed until the end of run. This allows to correctly extract files in such directories.
In copy-in mode, permissions of a directory are restored if it appears in the file list after files in it (find . -depth). This fixes debian bug #458079.
Fix possible memory overflow in the rmt client code (CVE-2010-0624).
Ensure record headers are properly packed (fix builds on ARM).
Fix exit codes to reliably indicate success or failure of the operation.
